lead_paragraph: Arizona State fired Coach Dirk Koetter after he led his team to a bowl the past three seasons but rarely beat the best in the Pacific-10. Koetter went 40-33 in six seasons at A.S.U. The Sun Devils completed a 7-5 regular season, clinching their third consecutive postseason berth. Koetter went 21-28 in the Pac-10.
